I supposed you should go back to the start > Return to Start a1 1 1 Dialog ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////START GAME//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// You wake up, finding yourself in the middle of a forest. The trees are thick and the sky is dark, you feel
as if something is wrong.

Your body is cramped and you find it hard to move

Regardless, you stand up, and your eyes are drawn to the path ahead of you. > Continue a2 1 1 Dialog You walk. The atmosphere around is eerily silent. You start wonder why your head feels so heavy and why you are in a forest.

The silence is interrupted by a voice in the distance. It seems to be calling out to you. > Continue a3 1 1 Dialog You move towards the voice, and you start to see a figure in the distance.

"Oh thank heavens a survivor! Quickly, there is no time to waste! I will explain on the way."

A young woman dressed in elegant robes appear before you and quickly grabs your arm. With no strength to resist, you are dragged away. > Continue a4 1 1 Dialog

"You are tired and confused so I will keep this simple. I am a Guardian, sworn to protect this sacred forest."

The woman introduces herself as she pulls you towards an intersection in the distance.

"Not too long ago this forest has been consumed by an evil curse. You are one of its dwellers; this forest is your home"

> Continue a5 1 1 Dialog In the wave of her hand, the sword and shield float towards you.

"These weapons will help you in your endeavor, and also heal you. Choose one and be on your way." > Sword > Shield > Sword and Shield > Unarmed b1 c1 d1 e1 1 1 Dialog ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////SWORD PATH//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// You pick up the sword.

"This sword will cut through steel and magic, but it will not hold in face of strong spells. Be careful with your defense."

"Are you sure you will use this?" > Yes > No b2 a5 1 1 Dialog "Very well, I wish you the best of luck on your journey. The fate of this forest rests in your hands."

You feel the sword\'s magic flow through your body. You are healed and your senses have come back to normal.

You feel as if there something amiss with the Guardian, likely because of the curse.

Without dwelling on it, you head towards… > The Witch of the Northh > Knight of the East > The Dragon of the West > The Priest of the South b2a1 b2b1 b2c1 b2d1 1 1 Dialog You arrive at the north of the forest, where a curse lays. Beyond rests the ruins of a small village, nestled deep within the thick trees. At the edge is the remains of what seemed to be a church.

You enter its dusty doors, and across the large hall sits a witch on her wicked throne.
You approach slowly, and she stands and looks down on you.
> Continue b2a2 1 1 Dialog You arrive at the east of the forest, where a curse lays. As you enter you are met with a vast plain of flowers. Though the sight is beautiful, you know that the pale white color of the petals is a sign that the flower has been removed of its life force

In the distance, you see a figure huddled underneath a tree in the middle of the area.
It seems to be…laughing? > Continue b2b2 1 1 Dialog You arrive at the west of the forest, where a curse lays. The area is warm and mountainous, where snow and ice are found, instead you find fire and lava popping from the ground.

You hear a booming roar, and in the distance, a colossal figure rises from the horizon. Its head then moves towards your direction, and it begins to fly.
> Continue b2c2 1 1 Dialog You arrive at the south of the forest, where a curse lays. Before you is a wet and damp swamp, with the effects of the curse changing the color of the water to an eerie purple.

In front of you is an enclosure, where a beast-man priest with a lion\'s head stands in the middle. His eyes are pale, and lifeless. He notices your presence, and braces himself.
> Continue b2d2 1 1 Dialog //////////////////B2A1////////////////// "Intruder, it is safe to assume you are here to kill me?"

She raises her hand, and spears of light appear behind her. Her eyes glow as she readies the spell, but they do not hide the clear sorrow and regret inside.

"Do what you must, but know that this is not by my will." > Raise your sword and dash [Attack] > Raise your sword and block [Defend] > "What is this place?" > "Not by your will?" b2a2a1 b2a2b1 b2a2c1 b2a2d1 1 1 Dialog She fires the spears at your direction. With fluid movement, you dodge every spear and approach the witch.

You get in range, and slash, but she blocks it with a barrier.

"Your weapon may be strong, but it is not enough against my magic."

She locks your sword in the barrier, before long it begins to glow. She notices this and throws it away, leaving you helpless against her attacks. As you draw your final breath and all turns black, you see a small tear being shed for you > GAME OVER gameOver 1 1 Dialog She fires the spears at your direction. With precise technique, you slash at every spear that approach you.

With every spear blocked, you start to feel your sword beginning to burn brightly. The witch falters at the sight of the glowing blade

"No…not again!"

She summons more spears, but before she can fire them, you move in for the kill, but she blocks it with a barrier.

"My magic is strong! I won\'t lose against you!"

With her trembling voice, she begins to chant a spell, but her barrier begins to crack as the bright sword pressures her magic.
> Continue b2a1b2 1 1 Dialog "How ignorant, you are inside the church of the sacred forest. Pay your respects." > Continue b2a2 1 1 Dialog "I follow only the will of the…forest?…but I…no! I must not falter." > Continue b2a2 1 1 Dialog She notices the cracks, and fumbles her spell, shocking her due to recoil. This causes the barrier to break, and your sword to deal her a fatal blow.

The witch staggers and falls to the ground. She sobs as life leaves her eyes.

"I couldn\'t protect everyone…"

You have defeated a curse, allowing the Guardian to eliminate the other curses, reclaiming the sacred forest.

Though you feel something is amiss, all is well.

"Heehee...heeeheeee...there isss an intruder today....how about we go and...play?"

In an instant, he grabs his two swords and lunges towards you. Fortunately you manage to block, and behind his unkempt hair you see his maniacal, bloodshot eyes.

"HAHAHAHA!! I LIKE YOUR SWORD, LETS SEE IF IT BREAKS!!" > Fight back and match his energy [Attack] > Block and wait for an opening [Defend] > "Did you break the flowers too?" > "You\'re crazy!" b2b2a1 b2b2b1 b2b2c1 b2b2d1 1 1 Dialog You steel yourself and push him away.

"HAHAHAHA!! THAT'S RIGHT!! LET'S PLAY UNTIL WE DROP!!!"

You begin exchanging blows, swords clashing against each other, its song echoing across the plains as sparks begin to fly.

The maniac is relentless with his offense, but you are no different. His harrowing laugh is contagious, as you begin to enjoy the battle as well.

Eventually, the maniac backs off for a moment to catch his breath. Seeing this opening, you go in for the kill.

>Continue > Continue b2b2a2 1 1 Dialog You steel yourself and push him away.

"HAHAHAHA!! THAT'S RIGHT!! LET'S PLAY UNTIL WE DROP!!!"

He begins to slash away at you, but you manage to be patient and block his relentless attacks. The maniac grows restless, as with every block and parry his attacks grow faster.

"WHY...ARENT...YOU...FIGHTING?!!"

He screams. You keep blocking and playing defense, you are yet to find an opening, and attacks are getting faster with every second. But eventually, he pauses and backs off for a breath.

You go in for the kill, but as you swing your sword, the cracks begin to show, and it shatters to pieces.

You look up towards the maniac, and the last thing you saw was his smile and your reflection on his blade. > GAME OVER gameOver 1 1 Dialog "HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA" > Continue b2b2 1 1 Dialog "HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA" > Continue b2b2 1 1 Dialog "Heh...heheheh...that was fun... I hope we get to play again."

He mutters as you remove your sword from his chest. The maniac drops his swords and fall to the ground.

You have defeated a curse, allowing the Guardian to eliminate the other curses, reclaiming the sacred forest.
